channel.title: Which product category should we introduce next?
channel.description: Over at www.productchart.com we have now 6 product categories online. Smartphones, Laptops, Tablets, 3D-Printers, Solid State Drives and Flash Drives. We get a lot of good feedback from users. What would you fellow bootstrappers introduce as the next product category?

item.title: Which product category should we introduce next?
item.dc:creator: ProductChart
item.description:
Over at www.productchart.com we have now 6 product categories online. Smartphones, Laptops, Tablets, 3D-Printers, Solid State Drives and Flash Drives. We get a lot of good feedback from users. What would you fellow bootstrappers introduce as the next product category?
